ast.name: Instant 3D imaging v0.1y
ast.comment:
Create stereoscopy.
-TD2.6 library supported.
(B.SP.Lib. required.)

1: Choose cross viewing or parallel viewing before take pictures.
2: Take 2 pictures (left picture 1st, right one 2nd*).
3: If preview picture is good, save it.

*keep composition of pictures as possible.
*shift your phone just 2 or 3 inches from left to right.
*turn your phone left to take panorama picture.

decls.name: isparallelviewing
decls.comment: if true; make 3D image with parallel viewing.

thenBody.text: button pushed and do some action.
